ED WL 321.title: Secondary World Language Methods
ED WL 321.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED WL 321.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning world language at the secondary level.

ED WL 321M.title: Secondary World Language Methods
ED WL 321M.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED WL 321M.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning world language at the secondary level.

ED WL 341.title: Student Teaching: World Language Secondary
ED WL 341.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED WL 341.description: Supervised fieldwork in secondary World Language classrooms (grades 7-12).

ED WL 371.title: Professional Issues in Teaching World Language: Secondary
ED WL 371.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED WL 371.description: Seminar in which secondary teacher candidates in world language share and discuss their field experience, explore further avenues of teaching content, and investigate more effective ways of engaging and supporting students.
